import numpy as np
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sb
df = pd.read_csv("../input/indian_temp.csv")
print(df)
source.4a8defce: We analyse the data frame to produce desirable plots for season JUN-SEP for 20 years.Seaborn barplot to represent this data for better visualisation. We conclude that year 1915 has the maximum temperature in this season and year 1909 has the minimum temperature in this season.
